As a Heat Treating Equipment Setters, Operators, and Tenders, Metal and Plastic with Master's Degree, your work involves set up, operate, or tend heating equipment, such as heat-treating furnaces, flame-hardening machines, induction machines, soaking pits, or vacuum equipment to temper, harden, anneal, or heat treat metal or plastic objects.
